topics.body:
For those who don't know that much about One Piece.

The grand line is a part of the ocean where anything can happen (Like there's an island where It's day forever) and compasses are completely useless. (Log Poses are the only reliable way to navigate the grand line.)
topics.author: 5062d6f17f123b3e16001184

topics.body:
"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554efc5a6368724446040d00#post_554efc5a6368724446040d00
Here's another thing.
The Grand Line (as per name) is a line that separates two parts of the world. The Red Line is the same thing, except it's a mountain range and is perpendicular to the Grand Line (90 degrees).
The Grand Line is protected by what we call a Calm Belt, two parallel lines at the outer part of the Grand Line. In the Calm Belt, there is no weather and no wind, making sails pretty much useless. Even if you have a motorized ship, you still have to deal with the countless Sea Kings (giant sea creatures) that inhabited the area.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976

topics.body:
Insane head canon: all post apocalyptic stories bar the zombie ones take place in the same world.

Mad Max is in the same world as Fallout and Book of Eli. Fallout just happens later. But Metro 2020 takes place a but after Mad Max.

What do you mean the plot holes could hold an elephant?
